verses.text: \w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H0834"\w* \w another|strong="H0120"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* frequent \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*:

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* substance, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* honour, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* wanteth \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* desireth: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* power \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*. \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* misery.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* attain \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w age|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* make \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w use|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* goods \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* substance, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w burial|strong="H6900"\w*: \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* pronounce, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* untimely \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* goeth \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* wholly forgotten.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* distance \w of|strong="H3045"\w* good \w and|strong="H7200"\w* evil:

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* \w two|strong="H6471"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* enjoyed \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*: \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* haste \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*?

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* labour \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*? \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* thither, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*?

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* thou mayst \w desire|strong="H5315"\w*, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* thou canst \w not|strong="H2088"\w* know. \w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* presumption \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w already|strong="H3528"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w*: \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* contend \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w judgment|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* stronger \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* disputing.
